argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mplsubg.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 2 |  | mplsubg.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 3 |  | mplsubg.u | |- U = ( Base ` P ) |
| 4 |  | mplsubg.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` R ) = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 7 | 2, 1, 5, 6, 3 | #P_mplbas | |- U = { g e. ( Base ` S ) | g finSupp ( 0g ` R ) } |
| 8 | 1, 5 | #P_psrelbasfun | |- ( g e. ( Base ` S ) -> Fun g ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> Fun g ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> g e. ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` R ) e. _V |
| 12 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> ( 0g ` R ) e. _V ) |
| 13 |  | #P_funisfsupp | |- ( ( Fun g /\ g e. ( Base ` S ) /\ ( 0g ` R ) e. _V ) -> ( g finSupp ( 0g ` R ) <-> ( g supp ( 0g ` R ) ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 10, 12, 13 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ph /\ g e. ( Base ` S ) ) -> ( g finSupp ( 0g ` R ) <-> ( g supp ( 0g ` R ) ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_rabbidva | |- ( ph -> { g e. ( Base ` S ) | g finSupp ( 0g ` R ) } = { g e. ( Base ` S ) | ( g supp ( 0g ` R ) ) e. Fin } ) |
| 16 | 7, 15 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ph -> U = { g e. ( Base ` S ) | ( g supp ( 0g ` R ) ) e. Fin } ) |
